Class GrantsApplicationServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.atu.green_global_initiative_api.service.GrantsApplicationServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
GrantsApplicationService
@Service public class GrantsApplicationServiceImpl extends Object implements GrantsApplicationService
Service implementation for handling operations related to grant applications.

  • Method Details

    • createApplicationDetails

      public List<ApplicationDetailsDto> createApplicationDetails(ApplicationCreateRequest applicationCreateRequest)
      Creates new application details based on the provided request.
      Specified by:
      createApplicationDetails in interface GrantsApplicationService
      Parameters:
      applicationCreateRequest - the request containing details of the new application.
      Returns:
      a list of created application details DTOs or null if an application with the same ID already exists.

    • getAllApplicationDetailsByApplicationId

      public List<ApplicationDetailsDto> getAllApplicationDetailsByApplicationId(String applicationId)
      Retrieves all application details by the provided application ID.
      Specified by:
      getAllApplicationDetailsByApplicationId in interface GrantsApplicationService
      Parameters:
      applicationId - the ID of the application to retrieve details for.
      Returns:
      a list of application details DTOs for the specified application ID.

    • getAllApplicationDetails

      public List<ApplicationDetailsDto> getAllApplicationDetails()
      Retrieves all application details.
      Specified by:
      getAllApplicationDetails in interface GrantsApplicationService
      Returns:
      a list of all application details DTOs.

    • updateApplicationDetails

      public List<ApplicationDetailsDto> updateApplicationDetails(ApplicationUpdateRequest applicationUpdateRequest)
      Updates the details of an existing application.
      Specified by:
      updateApplicationDetails in interface GrantsApplicationService
      Parameters:
      applicationUpdateRequest - the request containing the updated application details.
      Returns:
      a list of updated application details DTOs or null if no application with the specified ID is found.
